name: Kill jump monster
description:
This is a simple casual game
Control mouse
Click on the characters, or monsters that pop up from below to play the game.
Click on the monster to get the score
Clicking on a character will lose life
When the monster falls back below, it will lose life.
When life is 0, the game is over

The top left corner of the screen shows life
The score is displayed directly above the screen


Method of operation

Click on the monster with the mouse
